content.question: Bureaucrats are best described as

choices.label: legislators who are legally required to serve the public interest but in practice do not
officials who are responsible for the implementation of public policy
high-level elected officials in national or central governments
powerful political actors in civil society and the private sphere
local officials accountable to voters in the districts in which they work

content.answer: officials who are responsible for the implementation of public policy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
